TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebScriptEnablingBehavior extends System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class WebScriptEnablingBehavior Inherits WebHttpBehavior

summary.span: 提供行為的支援，該行為可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 端點從瀏覽器型 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端接收 HTTP 要求。

span.span: Provides support for the behavior that enables Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當套用至端點，行為可讓 WCF 和 ASP.NET AJAX 整合，除了 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 編碼所需的支援。When applied to an endpoint, the behavior enables WCF and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding. 各種不同類型的編碼 (包括 JSON) 都是由 或由適當設定的 啟用。Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the or by an appropriately configured . 行為會實作是繼承自，可讓 WCF 服務公開非 SOAP 端點的更一般的 Web 程式設計模型。The behavior implements the and inherits from , which enables the more general Web programming model for WCF services exposing non-SOAP endpoints. 具體地說，就是 ：Specifically, the : - 啟用 HTTP 程式設計模型，包括根據 URL 後置字元發送至作業、HTTP 動詞命令選擇 (POST 或 GET) 支援和 HTTP 快取期間控制。Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control. 如需有關 HTTP 程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 程式設計模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md)。For more information about the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md). 請注意，當使用這個行為時的預設 HTTP 動詞命令為 POST。Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior. - 啟用各個作業之要求和回應訊息的正確格式器，例如，URL 參數的支援。Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters. - 啟用 JavaScript Proxy 端點。Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint. 若要從 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端呼叫 WCF 服務，服務都必須設有繫結和必須加入端點行為集合。To call a WCF service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the binding and the must be added to the endpoint behavior collection. 做法是在組態中新增或不使用組態啟用內含的 AJAX 端點而不是中的預設處理站[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) .svc 指示詞檔案。This can be done either in configuration by adding the or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive in the .svc file. 如需有關讓 WCF 服務回應 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端的不同方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立 ASP.NET AJAX 的 WCF 服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md)。For more information about different ways to enable a WCF service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).

The to which the custom behavior is applied.

summary.span: 將行為套用至端點上的用戶端。

span.span: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 方法，以在搭配端點的所有訊息上或針對特定作業檢視、修改或將自訂延伸加入至用戶端執行階段。Implements the method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.

summary.span: 將此行為套用至服務端點。

span.span: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，這個方法是由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 時自動呼叫行為會套用至端點。Normally, this method is called by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint. 因此這個方法並不需要手動呼叫。So there is no need to call this method manually.

span.span: The that exposes the contract.

summary.span: 確認端點符合允許它當做 ASP.NET AJAX 端點運作的需求。

span.span: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 確認端點不是 `null`、使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 配置、未使用 、使用 HTTP GET 或 POST 動詞命令、繫結的 已設定為 ，而且該繫結包含其中 設定為 的 `true`。Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the , uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the of the binding is set to , and that the binding contains a where is set to `true`. 這個方法也會檢查方法上沒有 SOAP 標頭或包裝函式名稱，或其他不支援的作業部分。This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.

exception.span: 端點不符合做為 ASP.NET AJAX 端點的其中一項需求。

span.span: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
